issue.title: Task 3 / Checkpoint 2 Skip - Spinning and Flailing

content.raw:
I realized that the random world generation code may have changed so downloaded a new version. I am now **NOT** seeing the flailing. The main point of this issue is 'fixed'. Maybe documentation / instructions need to be updated? 

Another point is that after teleporting to where the robot is in front of the door with the door opened the door starts to close. The door is opened so violently that it bounces back close. I realize that the after normally opening the door it may close but this bounce back is extreme. Maybe a little less force on the opening? Arguable point, I guess.
